value.latex:
Exprimez en coordonnées polaires :
$\displaystyle y^2 {\partial^n f\over \partial x^2} - 2xy
{\partial^n f\over \partial x  \partial y} + x^2 
{\partial^n f\over \partial y^2} - x {\partial f\over
\partial x} - y {\partial f\over \partial x}.$
value.html: Exprimez en coordonnées polaires : \(\displaystyle y^2 {\partial^n f\over \partial x^2} - 2xy {\partial^n f\over \partial x \partial y} + x^2 {\partial^n f\over \partial y^2} - x {\partial f\over \partial x} - y {\partial f\over \partial x}.\)
